body_html: BTW in iotop command , I can only see one tensorflow thread reading disk io when I set thread number in tf.shufle_batch larger than 2 (only a few times it show 2 threads. ) is there a bug in multi-threading with tf.shuffle_batch ? @yaroslavvb
body_text: BTW in iotop command , I can only see one tensorflow thread reading disk io when I set thread number in tf.shufle_batch larger than 2 (only a few times it show 2 threads. ) is there a bug in multi-threading with tf.shuffle_batch ?   @yaroslavvb
body: BTW in iotop command , I can only see `one` tensorflow `thread` reading disk io when I set thread number in tf.shufle_batch larger than 2 (only a few times it show 2 threads. ) is there a bug in multi-threading with tf.shuffle_batch ?   @yaroslavvb
